form.label: Text field with dynamic radio buttons

div.h1: Simple XML - Form search with text field and dynamic radio buttons
div.p: This form search dynamically adds radio buttons, based on the search.

The <populatingSearch> tag populates the radio buttons. The <searchWhenChanged> tag propagates any change in selection immediately to the results. The form uses a time picker so it does not specify a time range.
div.div:
<input type="radio" token="from" searchWhenChanged="true">
<label>Select from address</label>
<choice value="*">Any</choice>
<populatingSearch fieldForValue="from" fieldForLabel="from">
<![CDATA[index=sample | top from | stats count by from]]>
</populatingSearch>
</input>
<input type="text" token="otherFilter">
<label>other search</label>
<seed>*</seed>
</input>
<input type="time" />
